mapper.insert: insert into order_products (order_no, product_no, user_id, amount, price, review_state) values (seq_orders_order_no.currval, #{productNo}, #{userId}, #{amount}, #{price}, 0)
mapper.select: select op.order_no as orderNo, op.product_no as productNo, op.amount as amount, op.price as price, op.review_state as reviewState, p.product_name as productName, i.img_sname as imgSname, i.img_type as imgType from orders o, order_products op, products p, products_img i where op.order_no = o.order_no and op.product_no = p.product_no and p.product_no = i.product_no and i.img_state = 1 and o.order_no = #{orderNo} and o.user_id = #{userId}
